description:
Jose Ricardo Zapata
----------------------
Lecturer and Researcher at Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana
----------------------
The automatic content analysis of musical audio signals has received
increasing attention from the research community, specifically in the
field of music information retrieval (MIR). MIR aims to retrieve
musical pieces by processing not only text information, such as artist
name, song title or music genre, but also by processing musical
content directly from de audio signal in order to retrieve a piece
based on its rhythm or melody. In order to build a computer system
capable of intelligently processing music, it is essential to design
representation formats and processing algorithms for the content of
music.
The main idea of the talk is show how python is used in audio
processing and analysis, nowadays in audio research python is the
most used language which for years was dominated by the use of
MATLAB.
----------------------
